page.title: 07Farming continued
page.content:
Very often when farms are sold the land is divided up into two or three lots. Sometimes the living accommodation is sold with just a small block of land, the rest of the land being sold to neighbouring farms.
Many problems face the farmers in this area. Those we spoke to mentioned the severe climate, the hilly wet ground, altitude and the Government's Milk Quota System.
There are several livestock markets within easy reach of our area. These include Leek, Newcastle, Uttoxeter, Bakewell, Derby and Chelford.
Farming here is not easy but all the farmers agreed that if they relived their lives they would choose farming but not in this area.
